description: To carry out tree surgery-to prune overhang over roof at side of house One Oak (T1 on map). To prune to previous points One Oak in rear garden (T2 on map). To pollard to old cuts One Hornbeam in rear garden (T3 on map) All in A1 within TPO 400.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The Oaks and Hornbeam are situated within the rear garden of 30 Copse Wood Way, they are
highly visible from the public highway in The Covert and have high amenity values. They
significantly contribute to the arboreal character of the Copse Wood Estate an Area of Special Local
Character and alongside other mature trees provide a gradual transition in canopy cover between
No reasons have been provided as to why the tree work is required as a result the work is unjustified and will have a negative effect on the amenity of the area.
The removal of deadwood, dangerous / hanging branches and ivy:  This does not require the formal consent of the Council.
